text: Yakɔsi n fafe hɔrɔmɔbanxi tide n Marigi Alatala bɛ, sɛrɛxɛe bama dɛnnaxɛ. Mɛnni surayi fama gande sɛrɛxɛ ra, taami sɛrɛxɛ sama teebili ma Ala bɛ, sɛrɛxɛ gan daaxi bama gɛɛsɛgɛ nun nunmare birin, sali rabama malabui lɔxɔɛe ra, kike nɛɛnɛe ra, nun sali xungbee ra. Yi sɛriyɛ mu kanama Isirayila bɔxi ma abadan.
